items.title: Visa Strengthens Fraud Prevention With New Scam Disruption Initiative
items.description: V's Scam Disruption initiative leverages AI and expertise to prevent fraud, protect consumers and enhance its leadership in secure digital payments.

items.title: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Discover Financial Services
items.description: Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Discover Financial Services are part of the Zacks top Analyst Blog.

items.title: 5 Financial Transaction Stocks in Focus Despite High Tech Expenses
items.description: The Financial Transaction Services industry gains from strong cross-border volumes and active M&A endeavors. However, elevated technology expenses and inflationary pressures remain concerns. Companies like V, MA, FI, FIS and WU are likely to navigate industry storms.

items.title: Visa (V) Continues to Capitalize on Digital Payments, Expands into High-Growth Areas
items.description: Meridian Funds, managed by ArrowMark Partners, released its “Meridian Hedged Equity Fund” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The direction of interest rates, inflation, and the outcome of the US election all had a significant impact on the markets throughout the quarter. In the quarter, the fund […]
